website_summaries.verdict: A classic Care Bear plush that's great for kids and adults looking for a blast from the past.
pros: Recommended for ages 2 and up and also available in Funshine Bear, Tenderheart Bear, and Share Bear
Looks just like the classic Care Bears from the 80s
Very soft and includes a tuft of hair on top
cons: Some bears appear to have uneven stitching or stuffing

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control, doesn't look like picture
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a really lopsided head. one cheek sticks out really far and the other not so much. and the eyes are just too close together. way too close together. and one is on crooked on top of that. the ears are really uneven. The shape of the belly is lopsided and warped. I am tempted to try to get another one but I'm not convinced that it will look much better, because there appears to be major quality control issues at whatever factory these are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: LOved that this bear is the closest looking to the ...
customer_reviews.text: LOved that this bear is the closest looking to the originals. The ones in the store to me look more like knock offs. Pleased with this bear.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie LaFave

customer_reviews.title: A blast from the past for a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: My bear came in the original packaging! I was so excited to see that because I've read other reviews where the buyer did not receive the bear in the original package. I guess it all depends on who you are getting your bear from. I feel like I lucked out. I loved the carebears as a child and this is a gift for my great-niece who is due to be born within the week. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey  Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Debating whether it’s a real authentic Care Bear or not
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this order. Shows Care Bear in the original box that it would of come in. But it’s in a plastic bag stuffed into a small cardboard box. And it doesn’t even smell like strawberries like the original Cheer Bear. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dery

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the 80's Care Bears
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy this actually is a classic Care Bear, as the original Care Bears the Movie is my daughter's favorite. It looks exactly like the ones I had as a kid in the 80's. Also, it's very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: YaYaYa

customer_reviews.title: Not cute
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, stuffing is uneven on stomach so one side sticks out much further. The nose is incredibly crooked on its face. And it’s eyes are crooked and mashed in.
customer_reviews.author: SFPitt

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cuddly, and nostalgic!
customer_reviews.text: A nostalgic blast from my past that my daughter absolutely adores!
customer_reviews.author: CBInteresting

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE COLLECTORS EDITION!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke! Paid a premium on the Collectors Edition that was released and it’s not even the same bear!
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife since her childhood was stolen. Trying to bring some joy she loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne The Rock Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuffy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, perfect size for toddler. My 20 month old LOVED it right out of the box on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Collectible cute bear
customer_reviews.text: So cute ! The target version ! Comes in a collectible box ! Great for displaying collectibles!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Just the best
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like the one I had as a child. It's in perfect condition. So glad to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love care bears
customer_reviews.text: It's for my grand daughter for Christmas. I bought one of these for my daughter when she was little and she still has it
customer_reviews.author: Tami s kubat

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old niece loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for her, and she loved it. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a little one
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my lil niece on her Birthday and she loves it !! Soft and cute! Great gift .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Made my wife cry for joy... amazing! Definitely brings back happy childhood memories
customer_reviews.author: Clinton G Wendorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful plush and excellent quality including the corn silk hair tuft on top. Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heartsong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is going to love this wonderful Care Bear.
customer_reviews.author: gale mendes

customer_reviews.title: Carebear perfection
customer_reviews.text: It was well made and packaged well...get it. If you are into that sort of thing
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Used toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a USED care bear! The fur was not fluffy like a new one and there was obvious wear to the bear. It was delivered in a cardboard box wrapped in plastic, no original box.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Terral

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously soft! Super cute and cuddly. My niece won’t let it out of her sight...
customer_reviews.author: faciltigre

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our daughter who loves carebears. True to the original Cheer Bear look and very soft/sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 4 yr. old who asked for a "Rainbow" Care Bear, and she loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The original bear from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: I had carebears when I was little and I loved being able to have the one that I remember growing up. I love my bear!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 5yo. Much like mine when I was a child!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to have found this for the price!! Way cheaper than other places and the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Callin

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: Just the way I remember the care bear to be. I gave it to my granddaughter. Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: my girlriend loved it she had one as a child
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mother as she had one as a kid she absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Box was dented as described but the product was undamaged. Great deal!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter will love.
customer_reviews.text: What I remember the ones being like as a little girl.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find this original looking Care Bear. My niece loves it! Arrived extremely fast.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t lose with this buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter hasn’t let go of it since we opened the box. Great item for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful gift!
customer_reviews.text: You made one little girl, who just discovered Care Bears, very HAPPY!

customer_reviews.title: Cutenes care bear
customer_reviews.text: So cute and soft, another wonderfull addition to my collection

customer_reviews.title: Great nostalgic gift!
customer_reviews.text: It looked just like the original and brought great joy to the recipient!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just as pictured and she is so soft 💕 perfect for care bear lovers :)

product_meta.title: Care Bears Classic 13" Cheer Plush, Pink
product_meta.description: Celebrate 35 years of caring, with these classic retro plush care bears! the collector's edition care bears plush are sure to bring back memories with the original 1980's inspired design! these iconic care bears stand 13" tall and are made with soft deluxe materials. Bring home these nostalgic plush pals and introduce them to your little ones! the perfect gift for kids and collectors alike! assortment includes: Funshine bear, cheer bear, share bear, and Tenderheart bear. Each sold separately. Age 2+
feature_bullets: Celebrate 35 years of caring, with these classic retro plush care bears! the collector's edition care bears plush are sure to bring back memories with the original 1980's inspired design! these iconic care bears stand 13" tall and are made with soft deluxe materials. Bring home these nostalgic plush pals and introduce them to your little ones! the perfect gift for kids and collectors alike! assortment includes: Funshine bear, cheer bear, share bear, and Tenderheart bear. Each sold separately. Age 2+
Care bears classic plush feature the original 1980's design
Perfect for both kids and collectors alike
Collect all four iconic bears including: cheer bear, Funshine bear, share bear and Tenderheart bear
